Zone.Name: Front Gate
Zone.Description: The front gate of the campground. A ranger sits in a booth.

Zone.Name: Road (North/South)
Zone.Description: A two-lane road leading further into the campground. To the south is the entry gate.

Zone.Name: Road (North/South)
Zone.Description: A two-lane road leading further into the campground.

Zone.Name: Road (North/South)
Zone.Description: A two-lane road leading further into the campground. To the east is a small hut with firewood.

Zone.Name: Road (North/South)
Zone.Description: A two-lane road leading further into the campground. There are washrooms with showers to the west.

Zone.Name: Road (North/South)
Zone.Description: A two-lane road leading further into the campground. To the east is a water station and to the west is a campsite, site #1.

Zone.Name: Road (All)
Zone.Description: A two-lane road. There is a signpost with 4 directions. North: Campsites 8 and 9. East: Beach. West: Campsites 1-7. South: Front Gate.

Zone.Name: Firewood Hut.
Zone.Description: Firewood is stacking neatly in piles. A bored teenager sits on a bench and offers bundles of firewood to campers.

Zone.Name: Washroom and Showers
Zone.Description: A building with washrooms and 6 shower stalls.

Zone.Name: Water station
Zone.Description: A water tap surrounded by rocks.

Zone.Name: Campground Store
Zone.Description: A general store offering things campers might need.

PlayerQuest.Name: Find your camp site.
PlayerQuest.Description: The kids are restless, your wife is tired. Let's find the campsite and relax.

PlayerQuest.Name: Find some firewood.
PlayerQuest.Description: Find some firewood so your family can at least entertain themselves while you gather the rest of the supplies you forgot to pack.

Item.Name: Camp Site #4 Permit
Item.Description: The right to occupy campe site #4.
